You people probably already know about this but for those who do not 
PBS is going to air Japan: Memoirs of a Secret Empire. I'm not sure 
how many episodes it is but so far I think they will show three on 
WTTW Chicago on May 26 8PM. You'll have to check your own listings 
though...

They also have a nicely done website tacking the subject divided 
into "Enter Edo", "Travel Tokaido" and a timeline... Good if you're 
like me who needed a crash course.... ^_^
Here's the link:  http://www.pbs.org/empires/japan/index.html
